titleStmt.title: A continuation of the history of the Reformation to the end of the Council of Trent in the year 1563 collected and written by E.B., Esq.
De statu religionis et reipublicae, Carolo Quinto Caesare, commentarii
titleStmt.author: Sleidanus, Johannes, 1506-1556.
Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: De statu religionis et reipublicae, Carolo Quinto Caesare, comentarii.
Attributed to Edmund Bohun. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
